summary: HR Administrator with 6+ years of experience in recruiting coordination, background checks, onboarding, and HR administrative support across multiple industries. Proficient in MS Excel, Taleo, SharePoint, PeopleSoft, SAP, and Adobe Acrobat with experience managing background checks, I-9/e-verify processes, and new-hire paperwork for large campuses.

experience.title: HR Administrator
experience.description: Provide administrative support to the Director of HR and Sr. Generalist. Verify employment requests for present and former employees; Ev5 and SAP. Process unemployment claims the same day via fax and mail. Enter benefit enrollments for new hires in Ev5. Onboard new hire paperwork in ADP Ev5 and SAP; process I9 paperwork. E-verify all new hires. Manage monthly cobra payments using Excel spreadsheet.

experience.title: Human Resources Temp
experience.description: Provided administrative support to the Sr. Director of HR, HR Assistant and Coordinator. Managed background checks; physician, physician assistants and nurses in ADP Select and EP Staff Check. Processed I9 documents; copy, scan and file. Updated benefit information in ADP Enterprise; add beneficiaries, change of address, dependents. Assembled corporate handbook and benefit packages for new hires.

experience.title: Recruiting Coordinator
experience.description: Provided administrative support to the Director of HR and 3 Recruiters. Uploaded and track new hire paperwork in Taleo; Applications, CV, Credentials. Maintained and update employee database report via MS Excel; i.e. pivot tables, charts, vlookup and filters. Scanned and upload documents in Applicant tracking system.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Provided efficient and professional administrative support to the Department and Dean of Liberal Arts & Sciences. Prepared department communication, correspondence, and memos. Created awards certificate. Maintained graduate award budget via MS Excel; stipend, tuition and fees. Compiled graduate awards data for MS Excel spreadsheet. Maintained department calendars. Assisted with requests from Faculty, Staff, and Student Body.

experience.title: Human Resources Communications and Staffing Specialist
experience.description: Compiled latest news from Wellness, President, Benefits, and Human Resources etc onto SharePoint weekly. Coordinated and maintained intranet content and design to ensure consistency, integration, accuracy, and usability. Manage reports in Learning Management Systems; courses that was taken, who signed up to take the eCourses. Designed print media such as posters, brochures, newsletters, and handbooks. Uploaded eCourses in Learning Management System. Assisted with the development of employee training program materials and managing training programs on the Learning Management System.

experience.title: Recruiting Coordinator - Human Resources
experience.description: Managed & troubleshoot ADP software, background check and drug testing for 45 campus locations. Scassembled new hire packages. Managed complex monthly billing using MS Excel -- VLookup & Pivot tables. Organized webinar training for newly hired human resources personnel. Trained human resources personnel on using ADP, Labcorp and eScreen software. Assisted with organizing onboarding agenda and materials. Compiled and distributed monthly Termination report via ePrise.

education.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Visual Communication
